questions.title: Two Whats And A Wow: Facts for Foodies!
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to learn the category for today!

questions.question: What in the world are the rules of the game?

choices.answer: You select the made up WHATS?!
You select the one true WOW!
Balance a spoon on your nose as long as you can!
Teach your pet rock how to high-five!

questions.question: Which of the following facts about food is the one true WOW?

choices.answer: You can treet bee stings by smothering the sting with melted cheese.
The Great Wall of China is held together by sticky rice.
Washing your hair with apple sauce can get rid of head lice

questions.title: And the true wow is...
questions.description: Watch and listen to this 1 minute video to see which was the winning WOW!

questions.question: Operation No See Food STEAM Challenge! What do you predict will happen?!

choices.answer: I will be able to identify the foods using one of my other senses.
I won't be able to identify the foods with my other senses!
I will discover new foods that I like!
I will be surprised that I like foods I thought I didn't like!
